title: Polki Diamond & Sapphire Petal Stud Earrings
materials: Natural Sapphire. Each polki diamond is carefully selected for its unique character and brilliance. The sapphire is of fine quality with a rich blue hue.
features: These earrings feature a modern jhumka design with square polki diamond studs surrounded by smaller brilliant cut diamonds. Beneath, a floral motif made of petal-shaped polki diamonds surrounds a central Sapphire. The setting showcases intricate openwork and allows maximum light to enhance the diamonds' natural sparkle.
occasions: Perfect for festive occasions like Diwali
or any special celebration. Also suitable for cocktail parties and modern gatherings where you want to add a touch of heritage.
description: These earrings offer a unique blend of traditional Polki craftsmanship and contemporary design. The use of uncut diamonds gives the piece a rustic elegance while the sapphire adds a pop of regal color. They are comfortable to wear and versatile enough to complement both traditional and modern outfits.
